name: Not Quite Immortal
description: In this thought-provoking 2D puzzle-platformer, you play as Mortia, a timid ghost girl from a small, isolated town, and embark on a quest across the haunted island of Creepy Hollow to investigate your necromancy mentor’s disappearance. Learn to harness your ghost powers to protect yourself from an array of monsters, as well as possess those monsters to traverse obstacles and solve puzzles. As you meet curious characters and gather clues, you will soon find yourself unraveling a far deeper mystery than you first expected...
